hero.title: Blvck Tumbler
hero.subTitle: For Lovers of the Black Lifestyle
hero.desc: Immerse yourself in the refined elegance of the Blvck Tumbler. Crafted for those who appreciate the finer things, it’s not just a tumbler—it’s a statement. Bold, sleek, and designed to elevate your lifestyle.

services.desc: Indulge in our handcrafted coffee, made from premium beans to deliver the perfect blend of taste and aroma. Every sip is an experience, crafted with love and passion to make your coffee moments unforgettable.

appBanner.title: Download Our App
appBanner.desc: Take the essence of our coffee with you wherever you go. Download our app for a seamless shopping experience, exclusive offers, and more—right at your fingertips.

footer.title-1: Expertly Crafted Coffee, Cozy Vibes, and Unforgettable Moments
